transcript:
Customer: Ye ho gaya?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji sir ji.
Executive: Haan hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan sir boliye. 
Executive: Haan ji haan sir haan ji haan.
Executive: A rapid se baat kar rahe hain na pharmaceutical se. Haan ji haan. Haan ji haan haan haan. Haan haan ji haan. Bataye.
Customer: Bas wohi hai sir aap karwa do ji usko.
Executive: Karwa dunga sir thoda sa time dijiye na ye aapka business hai dekho thoda sa pharmaceutical hai aisa thoda vast hai pharmaceutical hai time lagta hai listing ka to hai hi reason sir kyunki bahut competition hai isme. But aisa hai ki wo kya kehte hain 20-25 mein bhi 12 mahine ki chal rahi hai. Thoda sa time dijiye jo leads hai quantity ka bhi to jaate hain. But hai ki main aapko share karwa raha hu leads aur jitna ho sake aapki profile pe work karwa ke better karwa ke dunga sir aap time dijiye aur aayega achha result aayega sir. Main I promise you ko dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Theek hai. Haan ji sir.
Customer: Sir baat aisi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hello. 
Executive: Haan haan sun raha hu sir boliye.
Customer: Haan. Sir mujhe lead wali to baad ki baat hai mujhe platform clear kara do na ji aap.
Executive: Kya karwa du?
Customer: Platform jo IndiaMART ka hai main jab jab mera dil karega main utha lunga ji lead. Mujhe open hona chahiye ji aapka bhi kitna lead hai ji samne dikhna to chahiye sir.
Executive: Matlab wo dikh raha jo sold out valid mein dikhega sir aapko.
Customer: Kahan dikh raha kuch bhi nahi dikh raha ji.
Executive: Matlab wo already purchase ho gaya sold out ho gaya isliye nahi dikh raha aapko. Haan ji.
Customer: Sir sold out hoga is wajah se nahi dikh raha wo.
Customer: Sir baat aisi hai jo aapka platform hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Aapke paas kitni lead roj aati hai ji. 5-10 hazaar lead roj aati hogi na ji 50 hazaar lead roj aati hai.
Executive: Aapki category mein.
Customer: Sir meri category to chhodo 50 hazaar kam se kam lead aati hai ji aapke paas.
Executive: Main samajh gaya aati hai to haan.
Customer: Haan. Wo aapke platform to par to dikhni chahiye na ji.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ya to aap kahoge bhi hamare paas nahi bhejte ya aapke paas lead nahi aati ji. Do kaam to batao na sir. 
Executive: Sir jo aapki category hogi uska hi bhejte hain hum log. Haan phir aapki category. Aapke paas lead nahi aati na ji. Main ye kehta hu chahe to dekho do baat hai ya to aapke paas lead nahi aa rahi ya aap mujhe hame de nahi rahe ji bas kaam hi do hai ji hamare paas.
Executive: Bas theek karunga.
Customer: Kaam do nahi na sir. Platform platform wala bhi kaam karwa dunga aapka ho jayega sir wo bhi karwa dunga sir. 
Customer: Haan matlab ki galat to yehi hai na ji.
Executive: Jo bhi hoga main karwa dunga isme gap nahi milega har 10 din pe review kar liya karunga sir aapka catalog. Theek hai.
Customer: Sir 10 din wali baat nahi hai mujhe matlab ki daily ki report chahiye dusre din ki chahiye ji.
Executive: Main kar ke dunga sir sara kuch. Koi gap nahi aayega. Theek hai. Haan ji. Gap nahi aayega kar ke dunga sir har dusre din.
Customer: Theek hai ji ab matlab ki hum hame dikhegi aapki lead ji.
Executive: Dikh hi rahi hai active rehna hoga thoda thoda sa aapko. Haan ji. Active rehna hoga.
Customer: Sir active to aap kahoge raat ko bhi active rahenge ji hum. Theek hai. Aap din ki baat kar rahe hain hum raat ko bhi active rahenge aap batao to sahi na ji. Sir par kaam to aana chahiye na ji aise thodi hai matlab ki hame aap hum dine bhi rahe raat ko bhi rahe dine bhi rahe matlab ki aapko clear na kuch na pade par. Haan.
Customer: Pata to lagna chahiye na ji.
Customer: Hello. Theek hai. Haan. Sir aise nahi hai pata kya hai lagatar teen main aapko bata raha hu teen months se sir kharcha ho raha hai aap usko normally le rahe hain.
Executive: Nahi koi normally nahi le raha.
Customer: Pata kya hai aap kar rahe hain jo karna hai par jo karna hai wo nahi kar pa rahe aap. Main nahi kehta bhi aap kar nahi rahe aap jo cheez hai usko bana rahe hain jaise aap kehte hain bhi aapka profile bana diya usko bana diya jo hai aapka group bana diya.
Customer: Te suni da utar ke utar aate. Te jo karne wala hai na wo nahi ho pa raha ji.
Customer: Hello. Haan ji. Haan ji haan sir haan ji haan.
Customer: Jo cheez hone wali hai na ji aap wo karwa do ji hame. Wo koi issue nahi hai apne platform pe aapki jo 50 hazaar sir pata kya hai main aapko kahu maine matlab ki kaam lena hai sir. Main aapko matlab ki aap kuch bhi bol du main aapke paas isko bada package karne wala hu. Par karunga to main matlab ki milega agar. Package mat lo sir package lene ki baat hi nahi ho rahi yaha pe pehle hum aapka platform sahi kar de sahi kar de uske baad package ki baat baad me karenge sir package wagera to baad me lete rahenge sir. Koi dikkat nahi hai package ki baat baad me karenge. Matlab ki main kaam mera kharcha dal raha hai sir mera benti suno aap usko jo hai mera paas kaam karwa do sir matlab ki baat aisi hai mujhe lead dikhe main aise nahi hai meri baat to sun lo na. Man lo aapke paas maine ab ab baja hai dekho time kitna hua hai sir. Hmm. Kitna time hua dekhiye. 4 bajne wala hai sir. Haan 3:38 ho gaye na ji man lo main 3:38 pe gate apna portal khola ji IndiaMART ka usme mujhe 20 hazaar lead dikhi 10 hazaar lead dikhi 2000 lead dikhi. Mera man hai usko uthane ka maine utha liya ek hi uthegi na jitni maine leni hai utni uthegi agar dusri uthunga to bas mera kehne ka maksad hai mujhe jo hogi wo matlab ki jo fresh hogi wohi aayegi na jab samne likhi hui hai jab main dekhta hu mere paas number ek to lead hi nahi aati ji agar aati hai wo 5 din 10 din purani aati hai bas ye mera masla hai. Sir ye hai hi nahi dikkat pata nahi aap kyun keh rahe ho maine check kar chuka ye sab dikkat sir ek baar na aap video meeting mere sath kar lo aap. Theek hai aap time nikal ke video meeting kijiye mere sath.
Customer: Kal ko kar le ji.
Executive: Theek hai. Kal kar lijiye. Bas theek hai sir main aapko 10 baje 9 baje kitne baje maru phone ji. Main to 9 baje kar lo sir main 9 baje aa jata hu. Bas theek hai sir theek hai ji. 9-10 baje jitne baje connect kar lijiye. Bas theek hai ji. 9 baje staff aa jata hai. Ji sir main aapki concern ko close kar du sir ye jo aapne kiya hai. Ye aise na karna sir isko nahi karna hamara hal hi nahi hua aise kaise kar doge aap. Haan puchh raha hu theek hai. Hamara hal nahi hua sir. Theek hai theek hai. Haan agar hal kar diya to hum kar diya ji kal 10 10 baje karte baat. Haan theek hai ji theek hai theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants platform clear to see available leads.

- Expresses concern about old leads.

- States expenses are occurring without results.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.

- Executive agreed to a video meeting.

- Executive will review catalog every 10 days.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for the next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, platform, video meeting, catalog
